Package uml2rca.adaptation.association

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractNaryAssociationAdaptation<T>
    an NaryAssociationAdaptation generic abstract class that is used to factor common state for all concrete UML n-ary association adaptation classes.
    AggregationToAssociationAdaptation
    an AggregationToAssociationAdaptation concrete class that is used to adapt a UML aggregation into an equivalent general association.
    AssociationClassToConcreteClassAdaptation
    an AssociationClassToConcreteClassAdaptation concrete class that is used to adapt a UML association class into an equivalent concrete class.
    AssociationClassWithAbstractMembersAdaptation
    an AssociationClassWithAbstractMembersAdaptation concrete class that is used to adapt a UML association class having abstract members by moving down the association class into each non abstract child of each of its abstract members.
    AssociationWithAbstractMembersAdaptation
    an AssociationWithAbstractMembersAdaptation concrete class that is used to adapt a UML association having abstract members by moving down the association into each non abstract child of each of its abstract members.
    BidirectionalAssociationToUnidirectionalAssociationsAdaptation
    a BidirectionalAssociationToUnidirectionalAssociationsAdaptation concrete class that is used to adapt a UML bidirectional binary association into a couple of equivalent target unidirectional binary associations.
    CompositionToAssociationAdaptation
    a CompositionToAssociationAdaptation concrete class that is used to adapt a UML composition into an equivalent general association.
    NaryAssociationMaterializationAdaptation
    an NaryAssociationMaterializationAdaptation concrete class that is used to adapt a UML n-ary association by reifying it into an equivalent concrete class.
    NaryAssociationToBinaryAssociationsAdaptation
    an NaryAssociationToBinaryAssociationsAdaptation concrete class that is used to adapt a UML n-ary association by replacing it with the complete graph of n binary associations between the n types participating in it.
